org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io

类 BarrierTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.io.BarrierTracker
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointBarrierHandler

    @Internal
public class BarrierTracker
extends Object
implements CheckpointBarrierHandler
    The BarrierTracker keeps track of what checkpoint barriers have been received from which input channels. Once it has observed all checkpoint barriers for a checkpoint ID, it notifies its listener of a completed checkpoint.

    Unlike the BarrierBuffer, the BarrierTracker does not block the input channels that have sent barriers, so it cannot be used to gain "exactly-once" processing guarantees. It can, however, be used to gain "at least once" processing guarantees.

    NOTE: This implementation strictly assumes that newer checkpoints have higher checkpoint IDs.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNextNonBlocked

        public org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition.consumer.BufferOrEvent getNextNonBlocked()
                                                                                       throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Returns the next BufferOrEvent that the operator may consume. This call blocks until the next BufferOrEvent is available, or until the stream has been determined to be finished.
        指定者:
        getNextNonBlocked 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The next BufferOrEvent, or null, if the stream is finished.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown if the network or local disk I/O fails.
        InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread is interrupted while blocking during waiting for the next BufferOrEvent to become available.
        Exception

      • registerCheckpointEventHandler

        public void registerCheckpointEventHandler(org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks.StatefulTask<?> toNotifyOnCheckpoint)
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Registers the task be notified once all checkpoint barriers have been received for a checkpoint.
        指定者:
        registerCheckpointEventHandler 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        参数:
        toNotifyOnCheckpoint - The task to notify

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Checks if the barrier handler has buffered any data internally.
        指定者:
        isEmpty 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:

      • getAlignmentDurationNanos

        public long getAlignmentDurationNanos()
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointBarrierHandler
        Gets the time that the latest alignment took, in nanoseconds. If there is currently an alignment in progress, it will return the time spent in the current alignment so far.
        指定者:
        getAlignmentDurationNanos 在接口中 CheckpointBarrierHandler
        返回:
        The duration in nanoseconds
